description:
Based in North Little Rock, Arkansas, WH Law Offices has four other locations across central Arkansas, making us one of our area's leading full-service law firms for clients who have serious and complex legal challenges involving any of the following:

  • Bankruptcy
  • Business law
  • Criminal defense
  • Elder law
  • Employment law
  • Estate planning
  • Probate and estate administration
  • Family law
  • Personal injury

Our mission is to deliver the highly personalized counsel and dedicated support you need to make the best-informed decisions on the matters that affect your case, and our attorneys possess decades of combined legal experience to help see you through, no matter how complicated your needs and goals.

Devoted to superior client service, we offer a comprehensive range of quality legal services at affordable rates to help you obtain the positive results you seek as efficiently and cost-effectively as possible. Furthermore, you can rely on us to be there with you from our initial consultation all the way through to the end to improve your likelihood for success.

To find out more about how we can best serve your needs, you can contact WH Law Offices to schedule a free initial consultation. Our law firm also offers virtual consultation during this uncertain time to help keep you and your loved ones safe.

We are a debt relief agency. We help people file for bankruptcy relief under the Bankruptcy Code.
